body:
Thanks @pftg. I created two branches for each change. Do you know how I can pull/refresh my rails fork on github?




________________________________
 From: Paul Nikitochkin <notifications@github.com>
To: rails/rails <rails@noreply.github.com> 
Cc: Adrien Lamothe <alamoz@yahoo.com> 
Sent: Sunday, July 7, 2013 11:06 PM
Subject: Re: [rails] Use Request#raw_post instead Request#body in ParamsParser#parse_formatted_parameters (#11353)
 


@Alamoz try to create new branch and by using git cherry-pick move your commit to there and then with git push -f HEAD:<your remote branch>.
—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
